name: Festival della Diplomazia
goal: Organization of a Festival dedicated to diplomacy, international relations and cooperation
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: European diplomacy, international relations and cooperation. We are following all the directives about migration, external servises, european common defense, brexit, erasmus and cultural diplomacy
